p: These strategies are aimed at targeting the virus by (i) interfering directly with it, or by (ii) blocking/inhibiting its related biological process and events (such as viral entry and replication), or targeting human immune system, by (iii) enhancing it [ 2]. Advancements in the genomic and post-genomic fields enable to quickly scrutinize genome sequences, looking for similarity with other genomes and discovering potential druggable targets.
